description:
Agile, sturdy and heavily armed, the Siokorvsky Comanchero is a heavy attack helicopter used by the U.N. Forces. With a pilot and co-pilot handling weapons, the Comanchero can utilize it`s formidable array of rockets, missiles and guns against both air and ground targets. The Comanchero excels at close air ground support and anti-armor/anti-ground mecha attack.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/sdfmacross/comanchero.htm
name: Siokorvsky Comanchero
